moviedata.title: The Shawshank Redemption
moviedata.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

moviedata.title: The Godfather
moviedata.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

moviedata.title: The Dark Knight
moviedata.description: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.

moviedata.title: The Godfather: Part II
moviedata.description: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

moviedata.title: Pulp Fiction
moviedata.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

moviedata.title: Schindler's List
moviedata.description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazi Germans.

moviedata.title: 12 Angry Men
moviedata.description: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.

moviedata.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
moviedata.description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

moviedata.title: Fight Club
moviedata.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

moviedata.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
moviedata.description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

moviedata.title: Forest Gump
moviedata.description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate, and other historical events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

moviedata.title: Inception
moviedata.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

moviedata.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
moviedata.description: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

moviedata.title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
moviedata.description: After the Rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued by Darth Vader.

moviedata.title: The Matrix
moviedata.description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

moviedata.title: Goodfellas
moviedata.description: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito.

moviedata.title: Inglourious Basterds
moviedata.description: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

moviedata.title: The Social Network
moviedata.description: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he is sued by the twins who claimed he stole their idea, and by the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

moviedata.title: The Avengers
moviedata.description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

moviedata.title: The Departed
moviedata.description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.
